standards.name: Demonstrates competency in motor skills and movement patterns
standards.description: Students develop fundamental and complex motor skills needed to perform a variety of physical activities
indicators: Performs locomotor skills using mature patterns
Demonstrates non-locomotor skills with balance and control
Combines movement concepts with skills in small-sided games
Applies skill-related fitness concepts

standards.name: Applies knowledge of concepts, principles, strategies and tactics
standards.description: Students demonstrate understanding of movement concepts and apply them in game situations
indicators: Applies movement concepts to strategy in game situations
Identifies and applies tactics in simple games
Creates and implements offensive and defensive strategies
Analyzes and improves performance

standards.name: Demonstrates knowledge and skills to achieve fitness
standards.description: Students understand and participate in activities that improve health-related fitness
indicators: Identifies the components of health-related fitness
Engages in moderate to vigorous physical activity
Monitors and maintains appropriate fitness levels
Designs and implements personal fitness plans

standards.name: Exhibits responsible personal and social behavior
standards.description: Students demonstrate respect for self and others in physical activity settings
indicators: Follows rules and procedures
Demonstrates good sportsmanship
Works cooperatively with others
Accepts responsibility for personal behavior

standards.name: Recognizes the value of physical activity
standards.description: Students appreciate physical activity for health, enjoyment, challenge, and social interaction
indicators: Identifies physical activities that are enjoyable
Describes the benefits of physical activity
Expresses feelings about personal successes
Analyzes different physical activities for enjoyment

standards.name: Develops social and emotional competencies
standards.description: Students build self-awareness, self-management, and relationship skills through physical activity
indicators: Identifies and manages emotions during physical activity
Sets and works toward personal goals
Demonstrates empathy and perspective-taking
Makes responsible decisions

standards.name: Connects physical activity to overall wellness
standards.description: Students understand the relationship between physical activity, nutrition, and health
indicators: Identifies the connection between physical activity and health
Understands basic nutrition concepts
Recognizes the importance of hydration
Makes healthy lifestyle choices
